Class MenuInputHandler

java.lang.Object
parade.helpers.inputHandlers.InputHandler
parade.helpers.inputHandlers.MenuInputHandler
public class MenuInputHandler extends InputHandler
Handles menu-based input using arrow key navigation and ENTER key selection. Supports two menu modes: - In-turn card/action selection - Intro menu action selection

  • Field Summary

    Method

    Flushes any buffered characters from stdin before reading new input.
    ActionInput
    introSelect(String[] actions)
    Displays an interactive intro menu for the game, where the user selects from options like "Start Game", "Game Rules", or "Exit Game".
    void

    Enables raw input mode on the terminal to allow real-time key reading.

    Stops the menu input session by flushing any remaining input.

    • MenuInputHandler

      public MenuInputHandler(org.jline.terminal.Terminal terminal) throws IOException
      Constructs a MenuInputHandler using the given terminal.
      Parameters:
      terminal - the terminal used to read raw key bindings
      Throws:
      IOException - if terminal setup fails

  • Method Details

    • flush

      public void flush()
      Flushes any buffered characters from stdin before reading new input. Prevents unintentional keystroke carryover.
      Specified by:
      flush in class InputHandler

    • startInput

      public void startInput() throws IOException
      Enables raw input mode on the terminal to allow real-time key reading.
      Specified by:
      startInput in class InputHandler
      Throws:
      IOException - if the terminal cannot be set to raw mode

    • stopInput

      public void stopInput()
      Stops the menu input session by flushing any remaining input.
      Specified by:
      stopInput in class InputHandler

    • turnSelect

      public SelectionInput turnSelect(ParadeBoard paradeBoard, Player currentPlayer, String[] actionStrings) throws IOException
      Displays an interactive menu where the player can use arrow keys to navigate between cards and actions, and press Enter to select.
      Specified by:
      turnSelect in class InputHandler
      Parameters:
      paradeBoard - the current state of the parade board
      currentPlayer - the player taking their turn
      actionStrings - a list of available action commands (e.g., "End Turn", "Exit")
      Returns:
      a SelectionInput representing either a card or an action
      Throws:
      IOException - if reading terminal input fails

    • introSelect

      public ActionInput introSelect(String[] actions) throws IOException
      Displays an interactive intro menu for the game, where the user selects from options like "Start Game", "Game Rules", or "Exit Game".
      Parameters:
      actions - the list of menu options to display
      Returns:
      the ActionInput corresponding to the selected menu option
      Throws:
      IOException - if reading key input fails
